properties.displayName: Potential Binary Proxy Execution Via VSDiagnostics.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " /launch:" or ProcessCommandLine contains " -launch:") and ProcessCommandLine contains "start" and (FolderPath endswith "\\VSDiagnostics.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "VSDiagnostics.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of "VSDiagnostics.exe" with the "start" command in order to launch and proxy arbitrary binaries.
